PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-05732019-05-21,  HC,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Flavoured Purified Alcohol)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (FLAVOURED PURIFIED ALCOHOL) in order to reduce the health and safety risks associated with unintentional overconsumption and acute alcohol poisoning as a result of consuming flavoured purified alcoholic beverages by limiting the alcohol content in single-serve containers of these types of beverages.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0147 Publication Date: 2019-05-29
AttachmentsAttachment
